ygData.subject: RE: PoA bard quests plus a rant
ygData.msgSnippet: Hehe - they did not forget you!  They doubled the spawn time in your (mine too) zones!  Yup yup, rumor mill says 80 minute respawn in Sol-B and Lower-G.
ygData.messageBody:
Hehe - they did not forget you! They doubled the spawn time in your (mine
too) zones! Yup yup, rumor mill says 80 minute respawn in Sol-B and
Lower-G.

Nothing for mids? Kithicor and NewPaw? Too hard for mids. Risk/Reward not
there. Ya, ya, I know.

Verant has a distinct knack for missing the mark at times.

Sylly

-----Original Message-----
From: Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4 [mailto:g4mntofcr@...]
Sent: Friday, January 21, 2000 3:48 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: [eqbards] PoA bard quests plus a rant

From: "Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4" <g4mntofcr@...>

Rant on:
I have no problems with Verant adding more stuff for the 46+ players to do.
That gets them out of the zone where I'm at. What I do have a concern with
is the apparent lack of attention given to players less than 46th level.
